title:
I\'am new to the area and wondering if there are any Housing Projects that are for White\'s. I have noticed there are several that African Americans live in, but I\'am having a problem finding one for white people.\'



Thank You



Kathy
text:
Kathy,



Public housing in Wilmington isn't segregated. Here's a link to the
Wilmington Housing Authority's Web site:
http://www.wha.net/index.htm
